credit_line: Gift of Mrs. Robert Woods Bliss, Dumbarton Oaks Collection
title: Textile
medium: Silk and linen.  Plain compound satin.
description: Brocatelle type with pattern of stylized stems and leaves reserved in red satin on a ground of gold produced by extra yellow silk wefts floated over the surface of the red satin.  Main wefts are coarse linen.
name: Textile
